group_1.textLeft: Guide you, Umika?@I could never...

group_1.textRight: No, I have faith in you.
You helped me relax with that coffee at@Natsume Books, right?

group_1.textLeft: Back then, I just thought I should wait to get more@information before doing anything sudden...

group_1.textRight: Right. That opinion... that viewpoint of yours is@what I want to hear.
At that time, I was actually very stressed.
Not just because I couldn't find my friends,@but because I was experiencing a slump.

group_1.textLeft: You were in a slump? YOU, Umika?

group_1.textRight: I could hardly come up with any ideas, even though@my deadline was fast approaching...
And today's Witch hunt ended up dragging us@all the way out to Kamihama, to boot.
When you first met me, I'm sure I had horns growing@out of my head...

group_1.textLeft: Huh? I didn't see any horns...

group_1.textRight: That's how strung-out I was, though.
You listened to me despite how stressed I was,@and gave me your opinion.
I'm sure something about our current situation is@on your mind, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... I thought of something when I heard@Nanaka's story just now.
What if Kaoru isn't searching for Kazumi or Umika?

group_1.textRight: What's there for her to search for,@besides her friends?
...The Witch.

group_1.textLeft: Right.
Umika's been exterminating Witches while looking@for her friends this whole time...
So maybe Umika's friends are doing the same thing?

group_1.textRight: Ah, gotcha! Nanaka might've had an inkling of@the same idea, too!
THAT'S your idea of "nothing"?@I think you're right on the money.

group_1.textLeft: N-no... when I said it was "nothing," I meant...
I was thinking that the Magical Girls and Witches@seem kind of similar...

group_1.textRight: (...No way. Could Kako know the secret of Magical@Girls...?)
Y' think so? I can't see any kinda resemblance.

group_1.textLeft: Magical Girls from Asunaro City came to@Kamihama City today...
And right now, all the Kamihama Magical Girls@are in an uproar.

group_1.textRight: That's only natural. Witches are popping up@left and right.

group_1.textLeft: Yes... but why do you think there's so many Witches@today?

group_1.textRight: Why...?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it's because Umika and her friends chased@a Witch all this way?

group_1.textRight: Ah. That's what you meant by "similar," I take it?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's all...
Hmmm, I get whatcha mean. But I dunno how@that'd connect to the locations...

group_1.textRight: It just connected.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!

group_1.textRight: It's just like Kako said. Witches may have an@awareness of their territories too.

group_1.textLeft: Their territories?

group_1.textRight: They may not have the same emotions as humans,@but they could be provoked by things like their@Labyrinths interfering with each other.
So many of the Witches throughout this city@have woken up all at once...
The ones that lost the fight for their territory...@or the ones that respected each other's strength...

group_1.textLeft: They'd move elsewhere to search for another safe@location!

group_1.textRight: If we put together a map and timeline of where the@Witches are appearing...
We can track the route that the Witch we chased@here is taking.
And Kaoru's bound to be sprinting along@that very route!

group_1.textLeft: Heck yeah! We've combined the brains and bravery@of Magical Girls from both our cities!
If we compare all the information we have, the next@Witch should appear somewhere around...
Chuo Ward!

group_1.textRight: Akira, Meiyui? Any objections?

group_1.textLeft: None here!

group_1.textRight: None here either!
All right then!@We're off to Chuo Ward!
